(Channel Master Stream+) |upc=020572076005 |price=149 |est_release_date=04/2018 |fcc_date=02/21/2018 |manuf_country=Vietnam |is_manuf=No |manuf=technicolor |manuf_model=DWT765CHA |type=set top box |fcc_id=G95-CM-7600 |ic_id=431C-DWT765CHA |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88DE3218;BG4CT; |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=THGBMFG6C1LBAIL |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5AN4G6NAFR |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, PCIe x1, MicroSD Card slot, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8897;88W8897-NMJ2, K32YF.1JW, 1715 B1P, TW, C005; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=RF Demodulator;MStar;MSB1237;M, MSB1237, A7MNB10ZA, 1715B;2; ,,, Tuner;Rafael Micro;R836C?;;1; |flags=Bluetooth 4.1 LE, DFS (slave), HDMI 2.0, 4K, HDR, 3D, ATSC tuner, SPDIF out, Chromecast, |stock_os=Android TV;7.0;Nougat; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |oui=FC:94:E3, |oui_eth=FC:94:E3, }} {{TagLine|Channel Master Stream+ Media Player}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.channelmaster.com/Stream_Plus_p/cm-7600.htm}} {{See also|Channel Master CM-7600}} The CPU ID is not clear in the FCC photos but it appears to be from Marvell. :[[Marvell]] 88DE3218 / [[Synaptics]] BG4CT (Armada 1500 Ultra) :Quad Core @1.2/1.5 GHz (ARM Cortex-A53); GPU: Vivante GC7000XS *[https://sites.google.com/view/droid-tv/streaming-gaming/channel-master-stream ''Channel Master Stream+'' on '''Android TV Guide'''] (Spec.) ===Specifications=== *Brand: Channel Master *Model: Stream+ (CM-7600) *Manufacturer: Technicolor *Code name: DWT765CHA (Skipper) *SoC: [[Marvell]] BG4CT (Armada 1500 Ultra) *CPU: Quad-core @1.2GHz *GPU: Vivante GC7000XS *Storage: 8GB; RAM: 2GB *Broadcast: Dual-ATSC, IPTV *Android TV: 7.0 (Nougat) *Year: 2018; Country: USA *Dimensions: 104×83×72 mm *Weight: 270g ===News=== *[https://www.technicolor.com/news/fierce-innovation-award-goes-technicolor-s-skipper ''technicolor Skipper''] *[https://www.channelmaster.com/Antenna_DVR_s/336.htm ''An OTA DVR and Streaming Box for Antenna Owners''] ===See also=== *[[Technicolor DWT765CHA]] (Skipper) FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/G95-CM-7600 G95-CM-7600] :[https://sites.google.com/view/droid-tv/streaming-gaming/channel-master-stream Channel Master Stream+] (2018) *[[Technicolor DWT765FXT]] (Skipper) :[https://sites.google.com/view/droid-tv/pay-tv-provider/foxtel-now-box Foxtel Now Box] (2017) *[[Technicolor DCI765EKT]] (Cooper) :[https://sites.google.com/view/droid-tv/pay-tv-provider/euskaltel-deco-4k Euskaltel Deco 4K] (2017) *[[Technicolor UIW4010TCH]] (Indigo) FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/G95-UIW4010TCH G95-UIW4010TCH] :[https://sites.google.com/view/droid-tv/pay-tv-provider/att-directv-now AT&T DirecTV Now] (2018) *[[Technicolor UIW4010ECH]] (Indigo), Service: Sling TV :[https://sites.google.com/view/droid-tv/pay-tv-provider/dish-airtv-player Dish AirTV Player] (2016) *[[Technicolor CTLLG014K]] / LG S60CLI :[https://sites.google.com/view/droid-tv/pay-tv-provider/centurylink-player CenturyLink Player] (2017) *[[Arcadyan HMB9213NW]] (2018), BT 4.2, [https://help.netflix.com/en/node/23948/fr Netflix] :[https://sites.google.com/view/droid-tv/pay-tv-provider/bouygues-telecom-bbox-brooklyn Bouygues Telecom Bbox Miami 4K] (Brooklyn) :CPU: [[Marvell]] (Armada 1500 Ultra) BG4CT ==Images== [[Image:G95-CM-7600_FCC_MainBoardTop.png|thumb|none|250px|FCC Main Board Top]] [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
